channel.title: cohost on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in cohost on Ross A. Baker

item.description: First impressions of #cohost : Positive: Delightfully ungamified. I can't see my own follower count. I don't see heart counts on anyone's posts. The incentives are good there. Negative: I'm still an #foss hippie at heart. I'm skeptical how federation scales, I'm unlikely to ever hack on Mastodon source, I don't know my operators here ... but what's to stop another disastrous sale there?
